price: Ni wafu si wahai, na wala hawajui watafufuliwa lini.
arabic: أَمۡوَٰتٌ غَيۡرُ أَحۡيَآءٖۖ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبۡعَثُونَ
footnotes: Na hayo ni vitu visivyo na roho kama maiti, hayana hisiya yoyote, wala hayataharaki, wala hayajui Kiyama kitakuja lini, wala lini watafufuliwa hao wanao yaabudu. Wala si laiki yenu, enyi wenye akili, baada ya haya mkadhani kuwa yatakufaeni kitu hata mkayashirikisha na Mwenyezi Mungu katika kuyaabudu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: amwātun ghayru aḥyāin wamā yashʿurūna ayyāna yub'ʿathūna
